'''''Kairagi Chaos''''' is a weekly [[Reputation Request]] that occurs in [[Inazuma]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|A kairagi is making a mess somewhere on [[Narukami Island]]. [[Furuya Noboru]] hopes that someone can help put a stop to this quickly.}}
#Defeat the [[Kairagi]]

==Request Details==
Help Needed:<br>
{{Color|buzzword|The Kairagi are skulking about on the island}} and making trouble. These brigands are a stain on the name of the samurai.
Yet I, being duty-bound, cannot go out to strike them down. I would be most grateful if someone could carry out this deed in my stead.

==Enemies==
{{Enemies|Kairagi: Fiery Might,Kairagi: Dancing Thunder}}
